Sector.Name: Riftspan Reaches
Iiyoihakh
Sector.Credits: Riftspan Reaches sector was designed by Marc W. Miller and appears in Atlas of the Imperium (GDW, 1984). It was refined by James Holden and appears in The Travellers Digest. It was extracted based on information derived from 1248 Sourcebook 3: The Spinward States (ComStar Media/Avenger Enterprises, 2008).

Product.Author: Mike West
Product.Title: 1248 Sourcebook 3: The Spinward States
Product.Publisher: Avenger Enterprises in association with Comstar Media, LLC.

Allegiances.Allegiance: Aslan Hierate, Tlaukhu control, Eakhtiyho (5), Eteawyolei' (11), Fteweyeakh (23)
